text.text: Alright, now that you are done tinkering with those wimpy materials Selena thinks you should use, it's time for some REAL TINKER MATERIALS LIKE I USE. METAL
Obviously you will never be as cool and strong as I am for I am the one true §lTHRUUL M'GON§r however, I'm sure a novice tinker such as yourself can learn a thing or two and turn up the heat.
Don't forget to join me in my next book Tinker. Once you have your melter simply pour some seared stone over a book!
